channel.title: KenshinScape staff open
channel.description:
[b]Yea, i dont mean staff as in admin or mod and shitz like that before u go and lock, and/or mute me. [b][i]Alright, the main thing is that i am starting to get more players and need to get all of this coding done faster, i need assistance with some of the following: [b][i] 1) making quests 2) finishing P.C. 3) finishing some specs [b][i]I could also use some help in otherz of the folowing client sided parts: [b][i] 1) Adding more Crowns 2) Adding Lunar 3) New Sprites look at Login 4) 1-2 new Objects [b]Alright thats basically all i would need help with (its basically shit idk how to do) Wanna apply?? use this
Name= (what u would like me to call you) Client or Server sided coding? (basically what parts u would like to code put both if your wanting to assist with both) Skills= (just some things you do best in coding the java shitz...)
but yea, if this is completely agaisnt rules just edit it and/or lock it please.. sorry im NEW to this section

Do you have permission from a staff member?
[/quote]
u means staff on here or staff from somewhere else?? i didnt acually realise i needed permission from someone on here if thats what u mean… ill go get it now[/quote]

I Think he means on his server that he is devoloping

Read full topic

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[b]Yea, i dont mean staff as in admin or mod and shitz like that before u go and lock, and/or mute me.

[b][i]Alright, the main thing is that i am starting to get more players and need to get all of this coding done faster, i need assistance with some of the following:
[b][i]

  1. making quests
  2. finishing P.C.
  3. finishing some specs

[b][i]I could also use some help in otherz of the folowing client sided parts:
[b][i]

  1. Adding more Crowns
  2. Adding Lunar
  3. New Sprites look at Login
  4. 1-2 new Objects

[b]Alright thats basically all i would need help with (its basically shit idk how to do)

Wanna apply?? use this

Client or Server sided coding? (basically what parts u would like to code put both if your wanting to assist with both)

but yea, if this is completely agaisnt rules just edit it and/or lock it please… sorry im NEW to this section
